""We are seeking a competent writer who understands conservative politics, can produce 14 articles each week and has some experience writing articles on current events, news and politics. There are also some additional responsibilities that you will be trained on if there is a fit.Please only apply if you are very effective with English writing.We are looking for somebody who is able to comprehend and effectively communicate topics in American politics clearly to the average reader. Improve this resume bullet:
""Overview:We are looking for a skilled PCB designer to develop a compact Audio/MP3 player with advanced functionalities. The device is intended to play audio clips from a micro SD card or internal memory at predefined intervals, incorporating small stereo speakers for quality sound output. This project will be rolled out in two phases, each with distinct features aimed at enhancing user experience and functionality.The ideal candidate should have expertise in designing circuits for audio playback, integrating Bluetooth connectivity, and optimizing power management for efficient operation.Size of the design is very crucial as well as candidate innovation skills to repurpose commercial components is a plus.Project Details:The initial release will focus on essential features including stereo speakers, a micro SD card reader, an audio/MP3 player capable of reading files from the SD card, USB-powered board, and a volume knob for user control.Release 1 Features:1- Stereo speakers for high-quality audio output.2- Micro SD card reader for accessing audio files.3- Audio/MP3 player functionality enabling playback from the SD card.4- USB-powered board for convenient usage.5- Volume knob for easy adjustment of audio levels.In the subsequent release, we aim to introduce additional capabilities to the design:Release 2 Features (Enhancements):1- Ability to set customizable time intervals for automated playback. Either by switch, buttons or bluetooth interface.2- Inclusion of a USB outlet to provide additional continuous power supply for external LED device.3- Replacement of the SD card reader with a Bluetooth-enabled mechanism allowing users to upload audio files wirelessly.Deliverables:1- Schematic diagram and PCB layout files compatible with standard manufacturing processes.2- Bill of materials (BOM) specifying all components required for assembly.3- Acceptance will include a Prototype demonstrating both Release 1 and Release 2 features for testing and validation purposes. (to be discussed)Timeline and Budget:The project timeline and budget will be discussed with shortlisted candidates based on their proposals and experience. We aim to establish a realistic schedule that ensures timely delivery without compromising on quality.Posted On: February 17, 2024 19:33 UTCCategory: Electronic EngineeringSkills:Electronics, PCB Design, Circuit Design, Arduino, Embedded SystemSkills: Electronics, PCB Design, Circuit Design, Arduino, Embedded SystemCountry: Saudi Arabia""
